resources.string: Your nickname will be shown next to any content you post. You can\'t change it after creating your account.

Your helios. account is stored encrypted on your device, not in the cloud. If you forget your password or uninstall helios. TALK, there\'s no way to recover your account.\n\nChoose a long password that\'s hard to guess, such as four random words, or ten random letters, numbers and symbols.
To receive messages, helios. TALK needs to stay connected in the background.
To receive messages, helios. TALK needs to stay connected in the background. Please disable battery optimizations so helios. TALK. can stay connected.
Please tap the button below and make sure helios. TALK is protected in the \"Protected Apps\" screen.
If helios. TALK is not added to the protected apps list, it will be unable to run in the background.
%s was unable to run in the background
helios. TALK cannot check your password. Please try rebooting your device to solve this problem.

Your helios. TALK account is stored encrypted on your device, not in the cloud, so we can\'t reset your password. Would you like to delete your account and start again?\n\nCaution: Your identities, contacts and messages will be permanently lost.

For some reason, your helios. TALK database is corrupted beyond repair. Your account, your data and all your contacts are lost. Unfortunately, you need to reinstall helios. TALK or set up a new account by choosing \'I have forgotten my password\' at the password prompt.

Your account was created with an old version of this app and cannot be opened with this version. You must either reinstall the old version or set up a new account by choosing \'I have forgotten my password\' at the password prompt.
This version of the app is too old. Please upgrade to the latest version and try again.

helios. TALK was unable to start a required plugin. Reinstalling helios. TALK usually solves this problem. However, please note that you will then lose your account and all data associated with it since helios. TALK is not using central servers to store your data on.

plurals.name: expiry_warning
plurals.item: This is a test version of helios. TALK. Your account will expire in %d day and cannot be renewed.
This is a test version of helios. TALK. Your account will expire in %d days and cannot be renewed.

resources.string: This software has expired.\nThank you for testing!
To continue using helios. TALK, please download the latest release.
You will need to create a new account, but you can use the same nickname.
A context aware distributed social networking framework
Offers the opportunity to connect with new people, practice new activities or gain knowledge about certain topics. It is used by people with common interests.
The communications are fully distributed on the P2P network of HELIOS, each user is the sole owner of their own information, hereby safeguarding our privacy.

Users can create and share forums with their connections. In these forums, HELIOS users can discuss topics of interest anonymously. Public Forums are discoverable by other users and a forum can be also connected with a specific location.
Choose a nickname and a password. Be sure, you remember your password, otherwise you would not be able to access your communications. The password is used to encrypt and decrypt your local database.
The entered text is too long
You need to star messages to your conversations to access them here.
Add a contact to start a new chat.
No conversations available to show in this context.
Tap the + icon to add a contact
Tap the + icon to start a conversation
Image too big. Limit is %d MB.
Are you sure that you want to delete all messages?
Messages related to ongoing invitations and introductions cannot be deleted until they conclude.
Messages related to ongoing introductions cannot be deleted until they conclude.
Messages related to ongoing invitations cannot be deleted until they conclude.
Partly downloaded messages cannot be deleted until they have finished downloading.
To delete an invitation or introduction, you need to select the request and the response.
To delete an introduction, you need to select the request and the response.
To delete an invitation, you need to select the request and the response.
Are you sure that you want to remove this contact and all messages exchanged with this contact?
Saving this image will allow other apps to access it.\n\nAre you sure you want to save?
Your contact\'s helios. TALK does not yet support image attachments. Once they upgrade you\'ll see a different icon.
You can now send images to this contact
Tap this icon to attach images.
Only the first %d images will be sent
You have shared a file with %1$s.
You must meet up with the person you want to add as a contact.\n\nThis will prevent anyone from impersonating you or reading your messages in future.
Waiting for contact to scan and connect\u2026
The QR code you have scanned comes from an older version of %s.\n\nPlease ask your contact to upgrade to the latest version and then try again.
The QR code you have scanned comes from a newer version of %s.\n\nPlease upgrade to the latest version and then try again.
Could not connect to your contact
Please check that you\'re both connected to the same Wi-Fi network.
If this problem persists, please send feedback to help us improve the app.
Enter friend\'s link you want to add to your connections
Send a message to the contact you want to add to your connections
Share this link to friends you want to send you a connection request
There was an error adding the contact.
Waiting for contact to come online…
I would like to add you to my connections
Are you sure you want to remove this connection request?
Enter your contact\'s link, not your own
This link comes from a newer version of helios. TALK. Please upgrade to the latest version and try again.
You opened your own link. Use the one of the contact you want to add!
Adding this contact is taking longer than usual
Adding this contact is taking longer than usual.\n\nPlease check that your contact has received your link and added you:
You already have a pending contact with this link: %s
You already have a contact with this link: %s

%s and %s sent you the same link.

One of them may be trying to discover who your contacts are.

Don't tell them you received the same link from someone else.
You have shared a contact with %1$s.
%1$s shared a contact with you. Click to send a connection request!
You can introduce your contacts to each other, so they don\'t need to meet in person to connect on helios. TALK.
You already have one introduction in progress with these contacts. Please allow for this to finish first. If you or your contacts are rarely online, this can take some time.
There was an error making the introduction.
You have asked to introduce %1$s to %2$s.
%1$s has asked to introduce you to %2$s. Do you want to add %2$s to your contact list?
%1$s has asked to introduce you to %2$s, but %2$s is already in your contact list. Since %1$s might not know that, you can still respond:
%1$s has asked to introduce you to %2$s.
Before %1$s gets added to your contacts, they need to accept the introduction as well. This might take some time.
Tap the + icon to create a group, or ask your contacts to share groups with you
Choose a name for your group
Are you sure that you want to leave this group?
Are you sure that you want to leave this forum?
Are you sure that you want to reveal yourself in this forum? Your real username will appear in the discussion and forum members will be able to send you connection requests.
Are you sure that you want to hide yourself in this forum? Your real username will not appear in the discussion but old messages will still have your information.
Are you sure that you want to dissolve this group?\n\nAll other members will not be able to continue their conversation and might not receive the latest messages.
The creator of this group has dissolved it.\n\nYou can no longer write messages to the group and might not receive all posts that have been written.
You have invited %1$s to join the group \"%2$s\".
%1$s has invited you to join the group \"%2$s\".
You accepted the group invitation from %s.
You declined the group invitation from %s.
Only the creator can invite new members to the group. Below are all current members of the group.

You can choose whether to reveal contacts to all current and future members of this group.\n\nRevealing contacts makes your connection to the group faster and more reliable, because you can communicate with revealed contacts even when the creator of the group is offline.
Contact relationship is visible to the group
Contact relationship is visible to the group (revealed by you)
Contact relationship is visible to the group (revealed by %s)
Contact relationship is not visible to the group
Choose relevant to forum topic tags

You can view contexts as a way to organize your contacts. In different contexts you can initiate different threads of one-on-one or group conversations with your contacts by inviting them to join the context.
Choose a name for your context
Location permission is needed for core functionality
Location permission is needed for searching based on location
There was an error adding contacts to this context.
Rename Context. This name is not visible to your contacts.
Are you sure that you want to remove this context?\nAny conversations you\'ve created in this context will be removed. context .
Add a contact to start a new chat or invite contacts to current context.
Tap the + icon to add a contact, or select add contacts from option menu
No conversations available to show yet in this context!
Waiting for connection response in context...
Are you sure you want to reject context invite?
Private groups of conversation can be shared only by the owner/creator. If you want your contacts to share the conversation, you can create a Forum instead.
Waiting for connection response in private group...
Are you sure you want to reject private group invite?

Forums are sharable conversations and can be public (searchable and can be joined by anyone), protected (searchable but administrators and moderators need to approve your participation) or private (not searchable, can be joined only if directly invited from a member). Forums can also be linked with a specific location.
Choose a name for your forum
Are you sure that you want to leave this forum?
%1$s invited you to join a video call.
You have started a video call with %1$s.
Please come back here after adding a contact
There was an error sharing this forum.
%1$s has shared the forum \"%2$s\" with you.
You have shared the forum \"%1$s\" with %2$s.
You accepted an invitation to this forum already.\n\nAccepting more invitations will make your connection to the forum faster and more reliable.
You accepted the forum invitation from %s.
You declined the forum invitation from %s.
Any member of a forum can share it with their contacts. You are sharing this forum with the following contacts. There may also be other members who you can\'t see.
Posts from your contacts and blogs you subscribe to will appear here\n\nTap the pen icon to write a post

Are you sure that you want to remove this blog?

Posts will be removed from your device but not from other people's devices.

Any contacts you've shared this blog with might stop receiving updates.
There was an error sharing this blog.
You accepted the blog invitation from %s.
You declined the blog invitation from %s.
%1$s has shared the blog \"%2$s\" with you.
You have shared the blog \"%1$s\" with %2$s.
Anyone who subscribes to a blog can share it with their contacts. You are sharing this blog with the following contacts. There may also be other subscribers who you can\'t see.
Enter the URL of the RSS feed
We are sorry! There was an error importing your feed.

Are you sure that you want to remove this feed?

Posts will be removed from your device but not from other people's devices.

Any contacts you've shared this feed with might stop receiving updates.
The feed could not be deleted!
No RSS feeds to show\n\nTap the + icon to import a feed
There was a problem loading your feeds. Please try again later.
This setting will take effect when you restart helios. TALK. Please sign out and restart helios. TALK.
Connect via Internet (Tor) only when charging
Disables Internet connection when device is running on battery
Use the device\'s screen lock to protect helios. TALK while signed in
To use this feature, set up a screen lock for your device
When not using helios. TALK, automatically lock it after %s
Configure how helios. TALK will react when you use a panic button app
Are you sure that you want to allow %1$s to trigger destructive panic button actions?
Sign out of helios. TALK if a panic button is pressed
Delete your helios. TALK account if a panic button is pressed. Caution: This will permanently delete your identities, contacts and messages
This requires manual confirmation in a panic event
Show a reminder when the phone starts or the app has been updated
You are about to open the following link with an external app.
This can be used to identify you. Think about whether you trust the person that sent you this link and consider opening it with Tor Browser.
Please add additional comments to send along with the report
Please help us build a better helios. TALK by sending us a crash report.
We promise that the report is encrypted and sent securely.
Include anonymous data about the crash
Include anonymous data about this device
Report saved. It will be sent the next time you log into helios. TALK.

Another app is drawing on top of helios. TALK. To protect your security, helios. TALK will not respond to touches when another app is drawing on top.

The following apps might be drawing on top:

%1$s
Allow these apps to draw on top
To scan the QR code, helios. TALK needs access to the camera.
To discover Bluetooth devices, helios. TALK needs permission to access your location.\n\helios. TALK does not store your location or share it with anyone.

To scan the QR code, helios. TALK needs access to the camera.

To discover Bluetooth devices, helios. TALK needs permission to access your location.
\helios. TALK does not store your location or share it with anyone.
You have denied access to the camera, but adding contacts requires using the camera.\n\nPlease consider granting access.
Enter your device PIN, pattern or password to unlock helios. TALK
Touch your fingerprint sensor with the registered finger to continue

Content Aware Profiling Module runs as a foreground service when the user charging its phone. The profiler processes images in batches of 500 and intermediate calculated results can be shown below before completion. The intermediate and final results are stored in the contextual ego network. Select the algorithm you want to run and request the profiler to start the process.
We need access to read and write to external storage to run the Profiling Module. The process is run on device and all results are stored locally in the internal memory.
We need access to read and metadata from picture for optimizing the results of the Profiling Module. The process is run on device and all results are stored locally in the internal memory.
The public name of this Context is \t
Give a public name to this Context. This name will be visible to anyone.
